import React, { useState } from "react"; const CreateProduct = () => { const valueInitial = { name: "", manufacturer: "", description: " ", color: "", price: 1, imageFileName: "", screen: "", processor: "", ram: 0, }; const [product, setProduct] = useState(valueInitial); const dataCapture = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setProduct({ ...product, [name]: value }); }; return (

Create Product

); }; export default CreateProduct;
